title: Perspectives on a Changing Planet
description: Synthesis 1 introduces students to the methods, challenges, and rewards of working across disciplines and models of interdisciplinary thinking by using a variety of disciplinary perspectives to enhance students’ understanding of our changing planet. Students are asked to engage in interdisciplinary thinking through the course assignments. Prerequisites: Seventh College students only, completion of UC Entry Level Writing requirement, must be taken for a letter grade to count toward Seventh College general-education requirements.
